summary: The audit for https://movingagain.com.au/perth scored 96/100. Below is the list of issues requiring attention.

issues.remediation: Optimize your description length. Descriptions around 150-160 characters maximize screen real estate in search results without truncation.
Consider using more ARIA attributes (like `aria-label` or `role`) to enhance accessibility for screen readers.

issues.issue_detected: No mobile web app meta tags
issues.remediation: If you want PWA features, add standard mobile web app meta tags.
Consider inlining above-the-fold CSS to improve First Contentful Paint.
If you have multiple language or regional versions of your site, add `<link rel="alternate" hreflang="x" href="y" />` tags.
If this page represents a product or local business, add `aggregateRating` schema to be eligible for star snippets.
Add BreadcrumbList schema to display breadcrumb trails in search results. Include itemListElement with name, item URL, and position.

issues.issue_detected: FAQ content detected (8 Q&A pairs) - add FAQPage schema
issues.remediation: Add structured data to get rich snippets in search results.
Add missing NAP fields to your LocalBusiness schema for better local SEO.
